definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的过渡小组与每个区域办事处举办了视频会议。

sentences.english: We use tools like video conferencing to share knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 我们用视频会议之类的工具来分享知识。

sentences.english: Now we are having the N.P.T. video conference in New York.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们在纽约开核不扩散条约视频会议。

sentences.english: We have decided to invest in some new video-conferencing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定出资购买一些视频会议设备。

sentences.english: One class video-conferenced with students in Luxemburg.
sentences.chinese: 一个班跟卢森堡的学生举行视频会议。

sentences.english: Yet another form of computer-assisted communication is videoconferencing.
sentences.chinese: 还有一种计算机辅助通信的模式，即视频会议。

sentences.english: Videoconferencing can substitute for travel, saving expenses.
sentences.chinese: 视频会议能取代商务旅行，节省费用。

sentences.english: It also allows the usage of instant messaging and integration with some video conferencing solutions.
sentences.chinese: 它同时提供IM并且集成了视频会议系统解决方案。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new encryption scheme of videoconference on DDN network.
sentences.chinese: 针对DDN网络，提出了一种视频会议加密技术。

sentences.english: “Most of the existing videoconferencing technology is designed for meetings, ” said Pamela J. Hinds, co-director at the Center for Work, Technology and Organization at Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 现有的视频会议技术大都为会议设计。

sentences.english: There have also been seven videoconference reunion events, involving about 280 families.
sentences.chinese: 约有280个家庭还通过视频会议进行过7次团聚。

sentences.english: IVS (INRIA Videoconferencing System) is a widely deployed videoconferencing system for the internet.
sentences.chinese: 是英特网上广泛使用的视频会议系统。

sentences.english: It will have front-and rear-facing cameras, perfect for both taking snapshots and video conferencing.
sentences.chinese: 前后都配有摄像头，适用于拍照以及视频会议。

sentences.english: Responsible for video conference protocol develop for KEDACOM video conference products.
sentences.chinese: 负责对科达视频会议产品的协议相关的开发工作。

sentences.english: He set up weekly meetings, which he ran from a video-conference suite next to his office.
sentences.chinese: 他在办公室隔壁的视频会议间每周召开会议。

sentences.english: A planned secure videoconference was also scrapped.
sentences.chinese: 原定的保密视频会议也被取消。

definition: to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
VoIP (Voice over IP) (computing)/to speak with others over the Internet
to call a conference/to convene a meeting
